message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I think this is a fair split to start negotiations.
Your offer was a bit imbalanced, Alice. Let's find a fairer middle ground. This offer considers the time value of money for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your understanding of the time pressure.  I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, but it needs to reflect the fact that each round makes a bigger difference to me than it does to you.
